EmailTemplate.description: Email notification to licensee 120 days prior to License Expiration
EmailTemplate.name: Polaris - 120 days Renewal Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Polaris - 120 Day Renewal Notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This message has been automatically generated. *Please do not reply to this email*
Dear {!MUSW__License_Contact__c.MUSW__Contact__c}
This is a reminder that your license to practice {!MUSW__License_Contact__c.MUSW__License2__c} in the state of Washington will expire on {!MUSW__License2__c.Expiration_Date__c} and you cannot legally practice after that date.
Please log into the Washington eLicense Center portal to renew your license.
